dinosaurs.name: Tyrannosaurus Rex
quick_facts: Largest land predator of its time
Could crush bones with 8,000-pound bite force
Had tiny arms but powerful legs
dinosaurs.fun_fact: T-Rex had the strongest bite of any land animal ever!

dinosaurs.name: Velociraptor
quick_facts: Actually turkey-sized, not huge like in movies
dinosaurs.fun_fact: Velociraptors were actually covered in feathers and more closely related to modern birds than lizards!
